title: 6.2 Master Challenge 2
question: Plot a bar graph representing water access in the countries of the North American continent showing the percentage of access to safely managed water for a given GDP range obtained as input from the user. (Use exception handling to catch errors if there is no data available for a given GDP range.)
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
